akas: El Proyecto Vanilla Ice World-wide (Spanish title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: El Proyecto Vanilla Ice World-wide (Spanish title) (alternative title)

1.title: Treasure Hunting
1.plot: Rob and his right-hand man, Wes, are on a treasure hunt for their next project in Palm Beach, Florida. They check out four properties that have a lot of potential, but they also need a ton of work. After a scary situation leaves them spooked, the choice is clear, and Rob is ready to take on his biggest project yet.

2.title: Shell Shocked
2.plot: After surveying the property and running the numbers, Rob determines the only way to take his latest project in Palm Beach, Florida, from zero to hero is by starting from scratch. But it's a race against the clock because he and his crew only have 90 days to demo and rebuild the shell. In classic ninja style, they get straight to work tearing down walls - by any means necessary.

3.title: Pool Problems
3.plot: At Rob's latest project in Palm Beach, Florida, the current state of the pool spells disaster. It's small and square, not to mention filthy, so Rob designs a whole new look for this outdated eyesore to make it pool party-worthy.

4.title: Icing on the Kitchen
4.plot: The current kitchen at Rob's project in Palm Beach, FL, lacks the space and grace that Rob is looking for. He and the ninjas come up with a plan to give the heart of the home a full face lift with plenty of bling. Then they transform the living room into an area fit for the whole family.

5.title: The Backyard Bling Out
5.plot: This home's big backyard is a huge selling point but there's a lot of wasted space. Rob and the ninjas get down to business installing a landing pad, a luxury hangar and getting the run-down tennis court ready for action.

6.title: Working Out the Foyer
6.plot: Rob and the ninjas get a workout tackling a massive chandelier in the foyer and heavy exercise equipment in the club room. In the game room, a custom mural makes a statement and adds a touch of old-school charm to a modern space.

7.title: Extreme Exterior
7.plot: Rob and the ninjas take the exterior to the extreme by installing estate gates and revamping the landscape. It's all hands on deck to give this property some kickin' curb appeal that will bring buyers to the door.

8.title: A Modern Master
8.plot: Rob takes the master bedroom to the edge by adding an exclusive balcony and luxurious details fit for modern royalty. Custom drapes and plenty of bling are enough to make this master suite sing.

9.title: Bringing Back the Bath
9.plot: Rob and his crew pull out all the stops to make the master bathroom one for the history books. A custom stretch ceiling takes the space to new heights, while a gold-plated bathtub is a feast for the eyes.

10.title: Racing to the Reveal
10.plot: With the open house days just away, Rob and the crew are putting the pedal to the metal to finish their most epic renovation to date. From the souped-up garage to the interior design in the main house, there's a long list of things that need to be completed before the house hits the market.

1.title: Nice, Nice... Landscaping
1.plot: Vanilla Ice and his construction crew work on the landscaping.

2.title: Pool Party
2.plot: Vanilla Ice and his team give the backyard a facelift.

3.title: The Master Sweet
3.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew put the "sweet" back into the master suite.

4.title: A Tasty New Kitchen
4.plot: Vanilla Ice wants to give the mansion's kitchen the perfect look.

5.title: The Ugly Upstairs
5.plot: Vanilla Ice's daughter and her 6th grade class help renovate the upstairs.

6.title: Rescuing the Living Room
6.plot: The mansion's living room goes from busted to bling thanks to Vanilla Ice.

7.title: Rock Star Garage
7.plot: The garage becomes a tricked-out haven for car enthusiasts.

8.title: High Tech and Hidden
8.plot: Vanilla Ice discovers 500-square-feet of unused space in the house.

9.title: The Home Office
9.plot: The office presents more than a few design challenges for Vanilla Ice.

10.title: Rocking the Dining Room
10.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew race to finish renovating the mansion.

11.title: Rapping It Up
11.plot: The house is remodeled and staged, and now it's time for the big reveal.

0.title: Ice My House: Dallas
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Art of Curb Appeal
1.plot: Rob and his crew take the front yard to the top.

2.title: The Crazy Lazy River Pool
2.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew create a new lagoon style pool.

3.title: Tiki Island Oasis
3.plot: The final step in creating an oasis in the backyard is a Tiki Island.

4.title: The Killer Kitchen
4.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew create a state-of-the-art gourmet kitchen.

5.title: The Greatest Great Room
5.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew bring some high style to the great room.

6.title: Upstairs Reality Check
6.plot: Rob's daughters Dusti and Keelee help makeover the upstairs bedrooms.

7.title: The Master Hideaway
7.plot: Vanilla Ice and his team design and build a one-of-a-kind master suite.

8.title: The Ice House Retreat Suite
8.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew build a retreat-suite for guests.

9.title: Baby Got Back Yard
9.plot: Vanilla Ice and his gang must take the backyard from zero to hero.

10.title: The Ultimate Garage Getaway
10.plot: The old garage is transformed into a pimped-out refuge for car aficionados.

11.title: Elevator Up the Mega Den
11.plot: Rob and crew install a crazy glass elevator that opens in the gaming room.

12.title: Boom-Boom Screening Room
12.plot: A dated, oversized room is turned into a super high-tech theater room.

13.title: Punch List Olympics
13.plot: Everyone races to finish the renovations as an open house looms.

0.title: Ice My House
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Raising the Roof
1.plot: Before any work can start inside Rob has to fix the roof. But it's no easy task. He and the crew tear the dilapidated roof off the house and replace it with an epic hurricane-proof masterpiece, complete with an observation deck.

2.title: Picking Up the Pool
2.plot: In Florida, having a nice pool is a must. So, Vanilla Ice and his crew decide to salvage as much of the existing pool as possible, but kick it up a notch. They bust up the bombed out pool at this house to turn it into a tropical oasis fit for a rockstar.

3.title: Living in Style
3.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew flip the script on the great room in the house transforming it into a living and dining room, with a bar area, new fireplace, and decorative lighting. Complete with not one - but two chandeliers!

4.title: Fun in the Sun
4.plot: Vanilla Ice wants his house to be a place where family can play and enjoy the sunny Florida weather. So, he turns the old, washed-out tennis court into an epic sports court for basketball, volleyball, tennis or hockey.

5.title: A Masterful Bedroom
5.plot: Vanilla Ice takes advantage of the amazing view and layout of his home to create a unique bedroom retreat. He designs a ultra-lux master suite complete with a bamboo ceiling application, hand-painted wallpaper and a cushy sunroom.

6.title: Kitchen Conversion
6.plot: In order to sell a home fast, the kitchen has to stand out, but this one ain't gonna cut it. So, Rob and the crew completely tear out the old kitchen and put in a brand new, chef's kitchen complete with a new theater area.

7.title: Curb Appeal
7.plot: In order to sell a house, you have to get customers to the curb. Vanilla Ice (aka, Rob Van Winkle) and his guys give the mansion a little bit of curb appeal with new cultured stone, paint, a fountain, and killer custom doors.

8.title: Master Bath Retreat
8.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew deck out the dated and hated master bathroom, transforming it into an epic retreat with a freestanding tub, spa-shower, onyx counter tops and a connecting privacy patio for the ultimate escape,

9.title: Garage Busters
9.plot: People in South Florida love their cars. Rob Van Winkle and his crew decide to trick out the decimated garage by converting it into a Big-Boy Retreat, complete with a side patio for grilling and chilling.

10.title: A Tiki Island Paradise
10.plot: Vanilla Ice decides to capitalize on his waterfront property by building a Tiki Hut dock and beach area in the backyard. Coconut palms help turn the space into a tropical oasis. A neighborhood alligator might have other plans.

11.title: VIP Landscaping
11.plot: Rob and the guys put their landscaping skills to the test by renovating the bombed out yard. From excavating issues to neighbor complaints, Vanilla Ice and his crew have to push through the weeds.

12.title: Sleeping in Style
12.plot: Rob and his team rehab the "Jill & Jill" bedrooms and guest suite - making the mansion a stylish place to sleep. Rob's daughter, Keelee even gets in on the action, offering her tips and style ideas for the kids bedrooms.

13.title: Open House to the Stars!
13.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew tackle what's left of their mansion renovation. They race to stage and button up all of the loose ends before their scheduled luau and open house party - where they plan to show off all their hard work.

0.title: Ice My House: Queens
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: A Greater Room
1.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew take on the ghastly great room and transform it into a luxurious living space complete with shiny marble floors, a natural stone fireplace and a home theater built by hand.

2.title: Kickstarting the Kitchen
2.plot: Rob and his guys may have bitten off more than they can chew when faced with the challenge of crafting a Tuscan style kitchen, complete with brand new appliances, cabinetry and a one-of-a-kind ceiling mural.

3.title: Master Bath Blowout
3.plot: Rob and his crew have their work cut out for them when they gut the claustrophobic master bathroom and transform it into a spacious spa retreat which includes an exclusive patio and top-of-the-line fixtures.

4.title: Poolside Pump Up
4.plot: In order to give their barren backyard some serious swag, Vanilla Ice and his crew construct an epic swimming pool from scratch, complete with an infinity edge and swim-up bar.

5.title: You Can't Take the House
5.plot: All bets are off when Vanilla Ice and his crew design an exclusive poker room for their million dollar estate, complete with hardwood flooring, a wine rack and custom wallpaper. The guys also raise the stakes when blinging out the dining room and foyer.

6.title: Master Breakdown
6.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew pull out all the stops when they turn their bland master bedroom into a suite spot for future homeowners to call their own, complete with a fancy ceiling application, hardwood floors and a private entryway to the jacuzzi.

7.title: Game On!
7.plot: Rob and his guys are in pursuit of fun in the sun when they pump up their expansive property with entertaining amenities such as a volleyball court, putting green and a family friendly water park.

8.title: Kings of the Curb
8.plot: There's only one chance to make a first impression and Vanilla Ice and his crew are up to the challenge. Before buyers come to the door, they must transform the monstrous maroon mansion with a new coat of paint, an elegant water fountain and cultured stone accents.

9.title: The Upstairs Upheaval
9.plot: Between the game room, the deck and the kid's bedrooms, Rob and his team have their hands full when flipping the plain jane upstairs. Rob's daughter offers her own design ideas to make these rooms shine for future families.

10.title: Shift Into Gear
10.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew are putting the pedal to the metal as they soup up their busted down garage. The cavernous three car space gets put into overdrive with brand new doors, race track flooring and an exclusive man cave kitchen.

11.title: The Lakeside Lounge
11.plot: It's either sink or swim when Vanilla Ice and his crew attempt to put their lakeside property on the map by building aquatic additions that include a boat dock, beach area and an authentic tiki hut.

12.title: Green on the Scene
12.plot: Vanilla Ice and his crew get to flex their green thumbs with the landscaping of their expansive estate. From transplanting existing trees to bringing in a bevy of exotic Floridian flora, these guys know how to bring their yard into full bloom.

13.title: Wide Open House
13.plot: It's a rush to the finish as Vanilla Ice and his crew prepare to put their recently renovated estate on the market. From final touches to staging the key rooms, it's a race against the clock in preparation for their open house extravaganza.

1.title: A Killer Kitchen
1.plot: Vanilla Ice and his ninjas transform a cramped 80s kitchen into a million-dollar masterpiece featuring onyx counter tops, custom cabinets and, wait for it...a glowing jellyfish tank.

2.title: Mother Nature Vs. Family Room
2.plot: The roof is leaking as Rob battles a tropical rainstorm while creating the ultimate home theater room.

3.title: Icing the Outdoor Kitchen
3.plot: Rob and his ninjas create spectacular spaces on the waterfront. An outdoor kitchen and a stargazing observatory put this flip house over the top.

4.title: Upstairs Upgrade
4.plot: Rob tackles the outdated second floor of his beachfront mansion and gives it a facelift, complete with a fifth bedroom and brand-new game room.

5.title: Pool Predicament
5.plot: Rob continues to update the million-dollar home by adding on luxe features.

6.title: Outdoor Oasis
6.plot: Rob can take advantage of the ocean view at his Florida mansion and begins the process to create his own outdoor oasis. He installs a little something for everyone.

7.title: Jellyfish Jitters
7.plot: Rob wants to make this house unique, so he looks straight to the ocean to find it: jellyfish.

8.title: Dining Room Deluxe
8.plot: Rob and his crew are renovating a multi-million dollar home on the water, and it's time to tackle the dining room. A hidden wine cellar and lavish copper tiles set the stage for an opulent room fit for a castle.

9.title: Steam Clean
9.plot: Rob and his ninjas build an epic master bath, fit for a king, complete with a custom red cedar sauna and state of the art safe room.

10.title: Master of the House
10.plot: The next project Rob and the gang tackles is the master bedroom. Though problems with a hydraulic saw put the whole room reno into question.

11.title: Jungle by the Ocean
11.plot: Rob sets out to make the outside just as palatial as the inside, with some new Floridian landscaping and custom driveway pavers.

12.title: Turning Around the Garage
12.plot: Rob plans to turn the outdated garage into one any car fanatic would love, including a car carousel and wall of cultured stone.

13.title: Frenzied Finish
13.plot: It's full steam ahead to finish the house just days before the big reveal.

1.title: Hunting for the Next VIP
1.plot: Vanilla Ice and his number one ninja, Wes, search Palm Beach, Florida for their next big project.

2.title: Views from the Great Room
2.plot: Rob wants to turn this Great Room from boring to soaring.

3.title: Suite Dreams
3.plot: Rob and his ninjas transform the master bedroom into a massive room fit for a king.

4.title: Infinity and Beyond
4.plot: Rob wants to replace a small, enclosed pool with a custom infinity edge paradise, complete with a champagne hot tub and beach shelf. Continuing plumbing issues, though, leave Rob worrying that he may not get finished in time.

5.title: Kicking Up the Kitchen
5.plot: The kitchen and dining room at Rob's latest lakeside retreat are bland, boring and plain.

6.title: Bubbles Causing Troubles
6.plot: Rob wants to go big with this master suite bathroom.

7.title: Temple of Renovation
7.plot: The ninjas are embracing their inner children when it comes to the kids' bedrooms and play area.

8.title: Strike Zone
8.plot: Rob has big plans to turn the upstairs area into a gamer's paradise.

9.title: A VIP Main Attraction
9.plot: The family room receives star treatment when the ninjas go all out to renovate the outdated space. Rob adds a home theater system, sliding glass doors, and plenty of ice to make this one spectacular space the entire family can enjoy.

10.title: Docks & Crocs
10.plot: The backyard is a hot mess, but Rob has plans to turn the space into a calm and cool oasis.

11.title: Bringing Down the Roof
11.plot: Bad weather wreaks havoc as the ninjas install a new roof over the addition and revamp the exterior of the house.

12.title: Taking the Heat to the Street
12.plot: Things heat up when Rob and the ninjas turn the boring, outdated garage into a modern and colorful space.

13.title: A Rockstar Reveal
13.plot: Before the big reveal, Rob calls upon style guru, Krista, to furnish the house.

1.title: Commotion by the Ocean
1.plot: Rob and the ninjas are back in action looking for their next project, and Rob has some amazing properties to choose from. But the house that speaks to him has big problems. Will the ninjas be able to see the potential?

2.title: Hip Hop Hibachi
2.plot: Rob designs a VIP hibachi grill for the hero house with fiber-optic lights that change colors with the push of a button. It's safe to say the ninjas will be dining in style, so long as no one gets scorched in the process!

3.title: The Crown Jewel Pool
3.plot: Rob and the ninjas change the location and shape of an old swimming pool to turn it into the crown jewel it was always meant to be.

4.title: Fixin' The Kitchen
4.plot: Rob and the ninjas bring a boring old kitchen into the 21st century.

5.title: Making An Entrance
5.plot: The ninjas open up a dated foyer and take it to the next level with modern glass features and a high-tech elevator.

6.title: From Virtual To Reality
6.plot: The ninjas tackle spare rooms and a game room and give them each a mix of technology and style. With a final touch, they include a virtual reality gaming system that blows any competition out of the water.

7.title: Wrath Of The Bath
7.plot: Rob and the ninjas give the master bath a clean and serene upgrade with luxurious finishes.

8.title: Master Suite Disaster
8.plot: Rob overhauls a master bedroom and uses glass doors to transform the space into an oasis with a view. Then, he takes the entertainment to the next level by installing a TV that drops from the ceiling.

9.title: Great Expansions
9.plot: The ninjas shake up the main living room in this house with all-new lighting to brighten up the dark space. Ceiling tiles add a touch of glamour, and a chandelier that takes center stage brings the spirit of the ocean indoors.

10.title: Taking Charge of the Yard
10.plot: This property's ugly guesthouse is the only thing standing in the way of its curb appeal, and the ninjas are ready to face it head-on. After putting in the effort to remove the structure, they get busy taking care of the lawn.

11.title: Spacing Out
11.plot: Rob gets inspiration from the Kennedy Space Center for a rocket-themed splash pad complete with water jets and lights.

12.title: A Hot Rod Garage
12.plot: A great house isn't complete without the ultimate garage, and the ninjas know it has to be functional, organized and secure to protect the rides inside. Rob adds a TV and lounge seating for a multipurpose space that shines.

13.title: Sealing The Deal
13.plot: The hard work has been completed and it's time to reveal the masterpiece! The house has been fully updated, customized and improved, emerging as a beautiful space perfect for entertaining, relaxing or just having fun.

imdb.title: The Vanilla Ice Project
plot: Robert Van Winkle, better known as rapper Vanilla Ice, demonstrates his expertise in real estate and home renovation by renovating a house along with a team of handymen.::Anonymous
